title: Joshua Tree National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Joshua Tree National Park Evening Program at Jumbo Rocks      Time: 9:00 PM to 9:45 PM Location: Jumbo Rock Campground Amphitheater Fees: free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/04/2016 to 09/24/2016 Relax beneath the stars and enjoy a presentation about the park's fascinating natural or cultural history. View Details      Joshua Tree National Park Keys Ranch Tour      Time: 6:00 PM to 7:30 PM Location: Bring your tour ticket and meet the ranger at the Keys Ranch gate. Fees: Adults (12 & up) $10; Senior Pass or Access Pass holders $5; children ages 6-11 $5; children under 6 free     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/04/2016 to 09/24/2016 Explore the colorful story and numerous artifacts of this premier historical site. Tickets can be purchased day of the tour until 4:00 pm at the Oasis Visitor Center.  View Details
